hero.title: High-Tech Websites Development
hero.subtitle: Custom websites and web applications for businesses in Israel
hero.description: I build fast, scalable, and conversion-focused digital products. I help Israeli companies launch websites and web platforms that look premium and perform at a high level.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a professional web developer focused on building modern and optimized digital products. I work directly with businesses in Israel and deliver frontend, backend, API integrations, performance optimization, and SEO-ready architecture.

business-websites.title: Business Websites
business-websites.subtitle: I create premium business websites that build trust and generate qualified leads in Israel.
business-websites.intro: I design and develop business websites focused on credibility, speed, and clear positioning. Every page is built to support your sales process and communicate your value immediately.
process: I analyze your market, offer, and ideal clients.
I structure the site architecture around business goals.
I build responsive pages with clear conversion paths.
I optimize performance and technical SEO before launch.
deliverables: Custom UI aligned with your brand.
Lead forms and contact channels setup.
fit: Companies that need a serious online presence.
business-websites.outro: You get a website that looks professional, loads fast, and supports real business growth.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Development
ecommerce.subtitle: I build fast, conversion-focused e-commerce stores tailored for Israeli customers.
ecommerce.intro: I develop online stores with strong UX, clean catalog architecture, and stable checkout flows. My focus is revenue growth through better speed, structure, and purchasing experience.
process: I define product architecture and category logic.
I design conversion-oriented product and checkout flows.
I implement payment, shipping, and tracking integrations.
I optimize performance for mobile shopping.
deliverables: Integration with payment and analytics tools.
Technical SEO baseline for product pages.
fit: Retail brands entering or scaling online sales.
Stores that need better mobile conversions.
ecommerce.outro: You get an e-commerce platform built for growth, retention, and high-performance sales.

web-applications.title: Web Applications
web-applications.subtitle: I develop custom web applications with clean architecture and long-term scalability.
web-applications.intro: I build web apps that solve operational tasks, automate workflows, and provide reliable user experiences. The codebase is structured for maintainability and future expansion.
process: I map product requirements and user roles.
I design architecture and data flows.
I implement frontend and backend modules.
I test performance, security, and edge cases.
fit: Startups building SaaS or internal tools.
web-applications.outro: You get a stable, maintainable web application that is ready for real production use.

landing-pages.title: Landing Pages
landing-pages.subtitle: I create high-converting landing pages for campaigns, launches, and lead capture.
landing-pages.intro: I build focused landing pages with one clear goal: conversion. Messaging, structure, and UI are designed to reduce friction and move users to action quickly.
process: I define conversion objective and audience intent.
I craft section flow for clarity and trust.
I build fast, responsive, campaign-ready layout.
I connect tracking and form events for analytics.
deliverables: Responsive design optimized for paid traffic.
landing-pages.outro: You get a landing page that is focused, measurable, and built to maximize conversion rate.

api-integrations.title: API Integrations
api-integrations.subtitle: I connect websites and apps with external platforms reliably and securely.
api-integrations.intro: I implement API integrations that sync data across CRMs, payment systems, messaging platforms, and internal tools. The goal is stable automation and fewer manual operations.
process: I audit required systems and data contracts.
I design integration logic and error handling.
I implement secure API communication layers.
I monitor and validate sync reliability.
fit: Products that rely on external services.
api-integrations.outro: You get robust integrations that reduce manual work and improve operational reliability.

speed-optimization.title: Speed Optimization
speed-optimization.subtitle: I improve website performance to increase engagement, rankings, and conversions.
speed-optimization.intro: I optimize frontend performance using practical improvements that impact real users. Faster websites produce better user experience and better commercial outcomes.
process: I run performance diagnostics and bottleneck analysis.
I optimize assets, rendering paths, and scripts.
I improve loading strategy and caching behavior.
I validate Core Web Vitals improvements.
deliverables: Reduced load times on desktop and mobile.
Optimized CSS, JS, and media delivery.
fit: Businesses losing conversions due to speed.
Teams preparing for SEO and scale.
speed-optimization.outro: You get a faster, smoother website that supports stronger SEO and better conversion performance.

seo-israel.title: SEO for Israeli Market
seo-israel.subtitle: I implement technical SEO foundations tailored for search behavior in Israel.
seo-israel.intro: I build SEO-ready website structures with clean metadata, semantic markup, and localized targeting. This helps your business rank for relevant searches and attract qualified traffic.
process: I audit technical SEO and indexing status.
I build page structure for intent-based targeting.
I optimize metadata, headings, and internal linking.
I configure localized SEO signals for Israel.
deliverables: Localized SEO setup for Israeli audience.
fit: Businesses competing in local Israeli search.
Sites with indexing or structure issues.
Teams that need scalable SEO foundations.
seo-israel.outro: You get a technically strong SEO base that improves discoverability and supports long-term growth.
